title: Push Security - Detections
description: This dashboard offers a comprehensive summary of blocked URLs, phishing attacks, and stolen credential detections, providing clear visibility into active threats and security incidents.

definition.content:
This dashboard offers a comprehensive summary of blocked URLs, phishing attacks, and stolen credential detections, providing clear visibility into active threats and security incidents.

For more information, see the [Push Security Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/push_security/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
